alert.note: Alert for Baltimore; Carroll (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 12:36PM EDT until May 27 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Carroll County in north central Maryland... Northwestern Baltimore County in northern Maryland... * Until 115 PM EDT. * At 1235 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Littlestown to near Eldersburg to near Olney, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Cockeysville, Westminster, Eldersburg, Reisterstown, Hampstead, Manchester, Oakland, Gamber, New Windsor, Finksburg, Carrollton, Upperco, Freeland, Winfield, Louisville, Bentley Springs, Phoenix, Jacksonville, Butler and Monkton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for northern, central and north central Maryland. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for northern, central and north central Maryland.
